summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case, sent on July 29, 2019, from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to victims. It appears to be official communication regarding evidence or information in the case.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Victims
events.description: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York forwarded a voice message attachment to Epstein victims via email.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) was communicating with Epstein victims on July 29, 2019.
A voice message was attached to the email, suggesting it may contain relevant evidence or information for the victims.
The communication occurred shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing case activity.
